major_arcana.name: The Fool
reversed: Failing to be serious when required
Failing to honor well-established traditions and limits
fortune_telling: Watch for new projects and new beginnings
Prepare to take something on faith
Something new comes your way; go for it
questions_to_ask: What would I do if I felt free to take a leap?
How willing am I to be vulnerable and open?
How might past experiences help in this new situation?
major_arcana.description_short: Beginnings, innocence, spontaneity, a free spirit

major_arcana.name: The Magician
upright: Receiving guidance from a higher power
Becoming a channel of divine will
Expressing masculine energy in appropriate and constructive ways
reversed: Using cheap illusions to dazzle others
fortune_telling: A powerful man may play a role in your day
Your current situation must be seen as one element of a much larger plan
questions_to_ask: What am I empowered to do?
How might my abilities come into play?
To what extent am I making the most of my talents?

major_arcana.name: The High Priestess
reversed: Refusing to listen to your inner voice
Failing to seek guidance from spirit
fortune_telling: A mysterious woman arrives
A sexual secret may surface
Someone knows more than he or she will reveal
questions_to_ask: What might be revealed by meditation?
What am I hesitant to learn more about?
What signal am I ignoring from my intuition?
major_arcana.description_short: Intuition, sacred knowledge, divine feminine, the subconscious mind

major_arcana.name: The Empress
reversed: Insisting on getting your own way
fortune_telling: Pregnancy is in the cards
An opportunity to be involved in luxurious sexuality is coming
Beware a tendency toward addiction
questions_to_ask: What would a concerned and capable mother do?
What can I do that would emphasize growth?
How can I celebrate my own sensuality and sexuality?

major_arcana.name: The Emperor
upright: Being in control of yourself and others
reversed: Crushing the creativity of others with rules
fortune_telling: A father figure arrives
A new employer or authority figure will give you orders
Expect discipline or correction in the near future
questions_to_ask: How does the issue of control or regulation impact this situation?
What would a compassionate but strict father do?
What needs more control or structure?
major_arcana.description_short: Authority, establishment, structure, a father figure

major_arcana.name: The Hierophant
upright: Taking the tried and true path
reversed: Going through the motions of empty rituals
Rejecting the counsel of experienced teachers
fortune_telling: Expect to be caught in a misdeed and punished accordingly
Pray for forgiveness and confess wrongdoings
A more experienced man, spiritual leader, or father figure will come into your life
questions_to_ask: What role might tradition or religion play in this situation?
Who authored the rules? Who enforces them? Why?
How might an experienced teacher or guide view this situation?
major_arcana.description_short: Spiritual wisdom, religious beliefs, conformity, tradition, institutions

major_arcana.name: The Lovers
upright: Making choices based on love and passion
reversed: Refusing to take responsibility for your actions
fortune_telling: A new relationship or marriage is in the cards
Sexual opportunities abound
Relationships should be mutual and balanced
questions_to_ask: What key choice lies before me?
What values govern my decisions?
How does my decision affect others?
What role does love play in this situation?
major_arcana.description_short: Love, harmony, relationships, values alignment, choices

major_arcana.name: The Chariot
major_arcana.upright: Taking control, maintaining willpower, succeeding through determination, overcoming obstacles
major_arcana.reversed: Lacking direction, losing control, being aggressive, letting obstacles defeat you
fortune_telling: Victory is a certainty
Move ahead with all plans
Beware the jealousy of others
questions_to_ask: To what extent have I arrived? What will my next challenge be?
How can I use past achievements to their best advantage?
What would the criteria for real and meaningful success be?

major_arcana.name: Strength
major_arcana.upright: Having inner strength, showing courage, practicing patience, gentle control, compassion
major_arcana.reversed: Self-doubt, weakness, lack of self-discipline, raw emotion
fortune_telling: Your self-control will be tested
A woman will seek to change her partner or lover
You are a strong, capable person
questions_to_ask: How can I develop more self-discipline?
What behaviors tempt me? How can I resist?
What instincts do I need to control or channel?

major_arcana.name: The Hermit
major_arcana.upright: Soul-searching, introspection, being alone, inner guidance, spiritual seeking
major_arcana.reversed: Isolation, loneliness, withdrawal, rejecting help from others
fortune_telling: A period of loneliness begins
One partner in a relationship departs
A search for love or money proves fruitless
questions_to_ask: What would happen if I simply withdrew and took no action?
How can I get some perspective on the situation?
Who has walked this path before me? How can I enlist his or her help?

major_arcana.name: Wheel of Fortune
major_arcana.upright: Good luck, karma, life cycles, destiny, a turning point, positive change
major_arcana.reversed: Bad luck, negative external forces, out of control, resistance to change
fortune_telling: Some events are in the hands of heaven
You've lived through this before
What happened then?
questions_to_ask: How does this challenge fit into a larger pattern?
What role does luck play in my circumstances?
What can I control? How should I know when to relinquish control?
major_arcana.description_short: Good luck, karma, life cycles, destiny, a turning point

major_arcana.name: Justice
major_arcana.upright: Justice being served, fairness, truth, cause and effect, clarity
major_arcana.reversed: Unfairness, lack of accountability, dishonesty, unbalanced scales
fortune_telling: A legal verdict will be rendered soon
Someone is making a decision
You need to get the facts
questions_to_ask: How can I enhance my self-discipline?
What behaviors tempt me? How can I resist?
What instincts do I continue to struggle with today?
major_arcana.description_short: Justice, fairness, truth, cause and effect, law

major_arcana.name: The Hanged Man
major_arcana.upright: Seeing from a new perspective, surrendering, letting go, sacrificing
major_arcana.reversed: Stubbornness, refusing to see other perspectives, needless sacrifice
fortune_telling: A traitor is revealed
One of your friends is working against you
Change your ways or suffer the consequences
questions_to_ask: How can I radically alter my perspective?
How might being stuck actually be a blessing in disguise?
How can I help myself see the glass as half full?
major_arcana.description_short: Pause, surrender, letting go, new perspectives

major_arcana.name: Death
major_arcana.upright: Endings leading to beginnings, transformation, transition, letting go
major_arcana.reversed: Resistance to change, unable to move on, stagnation, decay
fortune_telling: A relationship or illness ends suddenly
Limit travel and risk-taking
General gloom and doom
questions_to_ask: What needs to end?
How might an ending actually be a blessing in this situation?
What's next?

major_arcana.name: Temperance
major_arcana.upright: Finding balance, practicing moderation, patience, finding meaning
major_arcana.reversed: Imbalance, excess, lack of harmony, hastiness
fortune_telling: Someone's using drugs or alcohol to excess
It's time to get back on that diet
questions_to_ask: How can I avoid extremes?
What does everyone involved have in common?
How might combining familiar things help me create something new?

major_arcana.name: The Devil
major_arcana.upright: Facing your shadows, breaking unhealthy bonds, exploring dark thoughts
major_arcana.reversed: Being trapped by addiction, giving in to temptation, feeling powerless
fortune_telling: Adultery and unfaithfulness
A string of extremely bad luck is coming your way
Beware evil influences and wolves in sheep's clothing
questions_to_ask: What enslaves me? How can I set myself free?
How can I re-evaluate the importance I assign to material things?
To what extent do my cravings define me?
major_arcana.description_short: Shadow self, attachment, addiction, restriction, sexuality

major_arcana.name: The Tower
major_arcana.upright: Sudden change, upheaval, revelation, awakening through difficulty
major_arcana.reversed: Disaster averted, delaying the inevitable, fear of change
fortune_telling: Impending disaster
Cancel plans and reverse decisions
Someone wants to take you down a notch or two
Don't hold back; say what you really mean
questions_to_ask: How might the current situation dramatically alter my perspective?
How might this loss open the door for new growth?
What attitudes need to be struck down before I proceed?
major_arcana.description_short: Sudden upheaval, broken pride, disaster, revelation

major_arcana.name: The Star
major_arcana.upright: Hope, inspiration, serenity, renewal, spiritual connection
major_arcana.reversed: Despair, lack of faith, disconnection from spirit, disillusionment
fortune_telling: Get an astrology chart drawn up
Someone is a little too starstruck
What's happening now has long been fore-ordained
questions_to_ask: What gives me hope and inspiration?
How can I be more optimistic?
What do I truly believe in?

major_arcana.name: The Moon
major_arcana.upright: Intuition, unconscious thoughts, mystery, dreams and illusions
major_arcana.reversed: Confusion, fear, misinterpretation, anxiety overwhelming you
fortune_telling: Watch for problems at the end of the month
Someone you know needs to howl at the moon more often
Someone is about to change his or her mind about an important decision
questions_to_ask: How can I face my fears and move forward?
What helpers can serve me as guides through my personal darkness?
How can I deal with the unknown in healthy ways?

major_arcana.name: The Sun
major_arcana.reversed: Temporary depression, lack of success, pessimism, sadness
fortune_telling: Everything's coming up roses (or sunflowers, whatever the case may be)
Whatever's on your mind, go for it because you can't lose today
questions_to_ask: How can I take best advantage of the attention coming my way?
What are my highest spiritual goals?
How can I avoid being bedazzled by the energy swirling around me?

major_arcana.name: Judgement
major_arcana.upright: Rebirth, inner calling, absolution, reviewing life choices
major_arcana.reversed: Self-doubt, refusing to learn lessons, lack of self-awareness
fortune_telling: An old issue you thought was over will come up again today
Get ready for huge changes: break-ups, sudden calls from old friends, and unexpected setbacks
God's trying to get your attention
questions_to_ask: What is the main thing I need to realize about myself?
In what way might the universe be trying to get my attention?
If I were to reinvent myself, what would I become?

major_arcana.name: The World
major_arcana.reversed: Lack of completion, stagnation, inability to finish things
fortune_telling: Winning the lottery
Getting your heart's desire
Having everything you ever imagined having
questions_to_ask: How can I see the world in a more complete and inclusive way?

How can I better appreciate the good things in my life?

wands.name: Ace of Wands
wands.upright: Inspiration, new opportunities, growth, potential, creative spark
wands.reversed: Lack of energy, delays, blocked creativity, false starts
fortune_telling: Creative energy arrives
Time to start new projects
Your imagination is firing on all cylinders
questions_to_ask: What new opportunity calls to me?

How could I best use my energy and talents?

wands.name: Two of Wands
wands.reversed: Fear of change, playing it safe, bad planning, lack of direction
fortune_telling: Beware false friends
Don't be meek; be bold
Your time for action has come
questions_to_ask: What would happen if I simply went for it?
How can I move from planning to action?

wands.name: Three of Wands
wands.upright: Looking ahead, expansion, rapid growth, foresight
wands.reversed: Obstacles, delays, frustration with progress, lack of foresight
fortune_telling: You'll be planning a trip soon

questions_to_ask: What preparations have I made for the future?

wands.name: Four of Wands

questions_to_ask: What achievements deserve celebration?

wands.name: Five of Wands
wands.upright: Competition, conflict, rivalry, diversity, growth through challenge
wands.reversed: Avoiding conflict, respecting differences, end of competition
fortune_telling: Prepare for a fight with your best friend

questions_to_ask: How do I handle conflict?

wands.name: Six of Wands
wands.upright: Victory, success, public reward, progress, self-confidence
wands.reversed: Excess pride, lack of recognition, fall from grace

wands.name: Eight of Wands
wands.upright: Swift action, movement, quick decisions, progress
wands.description_short: Speed, action, air travel, movement, quick decisions

wands.name: Nine of Wands
wands.upright: Resilience, courage, persistence, test of faith
wands.reversed: Exhaustion, giving up, overwhelmed, burned out

wands.name: Ten of Wands
wands.upright: Burden, extra responsibility, hard work, completion
wands.reversed: Failure to delegate, overstressed, burned out, collapse
wands.description_short: Burden, extra responsibility, hard work, stress, achievement

wands.name: Page of Wands
wands.upright: Exploration, excitement, freedom, adventure, new ideas
wands.reversed: Lack of direction, procrastination, creating problems
wands.description_short: Inspiration, ideas, discovery, free spirit, enthusiasm

wands.name: Knight of Wands
wands.upright: Energy, passion, inspired action, adventure, impulsiveness
wands.reversed: Anger, impulsiveness, recklessness, lack of direction

wands.name: Queen of Wands
wands.upright: Courage, confidence, independence, social butterfly, determination

cups.name: Ace of Cups

A new relationship or emotional experience is coming

cups.name: Two of Cups
fortune_telling: Someone has a secret crush on you

cups.name: Three of Cups
fortune_telling: Celebrations are in order

cups.name: Four of Cups
fortune_telling: A mysterious stranger will enter your life

cups.name: Six of Cups

swords.name: Four of Swords
fortune_telling: Don't make any decisions now

questions_to_ask: What would happen if I simply took no action?
